alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 4:46AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog Possible This Morning... Areas of fog (some locally dense) are expected to develop across portions of the area this morning. Visibilities may be reduced to around 1 mile or less, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities to one-half of a mile at times. Fog is expected to linger through mid-morning. If lower visibilities materialize, a dense fog advisory may be warranted. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
